ai-anya-e1210n0:1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-anya-e1210n0:4_0: The light in the world’s beauty and the next,
ai-anya-e1210n0:7_0: worshiping the Buddha and the teaching,
ai-anya-e1210n0:8_0: A senior monk who hasn’t reached the majority,
ai-anya-e1210n0:9_0: since he spoke of the teaching,
ai-anya-e1210n0:12_0: one allows two fingerbreadths grow, and two on each other.
ai-anya-e1210n0:14_0: Both to the state and the state of existence:
